title: Offline Friends List
body: I'm not sure if this is a bug or I cant find it, but my friends list is constantly showing all of my offline friends. How do I get rid of it? I tried the Group by Mobile and Group by Offline options, but they aren't working.

replies.body: That might be a weird side effect of persisted settings currently being disabled. Your client settings (like the ones you're having problems with) are all saved server side which is pulled each time you login usually. Since they're disabled right now, your client isn't able to pull or update those settings, which is most likely why it keeps resetting.
